meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'knowing', meaning possessing the most knowledge or understanding.
meanings.sent1: She is the knowingest person in our class, always answering every question correctly.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the students, she is the knowingest when it comes to history.
meanings.sent3: Even the teachers are amazed by her knowingest abilities in science class.
meanings.sent4: Her knowingest mind is like a library filled with endless information.
meanings.sent5: The knowingest student in the school is like a walking encyclopedia.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'know', meaning to be aware or informed about something.
meanings.sent1: After studying for hours, she knew the knowingest details about the topic.
meanings.sent2: She knows the knowingest shortcuts to get to school on time.
meanings.sent3: He knew the knowingest gossip in town, but he kept it to himself.
meanings.sent4: Knowing the knowingest facts about the case, she was able to solve it quickly.
meanings.sent5: The detective knew the knowingest secrets of the criminal underworld.
